title: Priyanka Chopra will voice Elsa in the Indian version of Frozen 2, with Parineeti voicing Elsa
text:
While Kristen Bell and Idina Menzel will return to voice Anna and Elsa in Frozen 2, in theaters November 27, the Indian-language version has landed two of Bollywood's biggest stars.

Priyanka Chopra took to her Instagram on Thursday night, to reveal she's voicing Elsa in the Indian version of Frozen 2, with her cousin Parineeti voicing Anna.

This will mark the first time the cousins have worked together, with Chopra celebrating the news on social media.

Bollywood stars: Priyanka Chopra took to her Instagram on Thursday night, to reveal she's voicing Anna in the Indian version of Frozen 2, with her cousin Parineeti voicing Elsa

'Mimi and Tisha are now Elsa and Anna! The #ChopraSisters are finally coming together for Disney's Frozen 2,' Chopra said.

'Can't wait for you guys to see us… I mean HEAR us bring these amazing, strong characters to life in Hindi. #Frozen2 in theatres on 22nd November 2019,' she said.

Chopra also spoke to the Indo-Asian News Service (IANS), where she revealed that she has a lot in common with Elsa.

Mimi and Tisha: 'Mimi and Tisha are now Elsa and Anna! The #ChopraSisters are finally coming together for Disney's Frozen 2,' Chopra said

'Elsa is a fictional character who''s known to be strongly-opinionated and level headed, traits that I deeply connect with,' Chopra said.

'This not only made me want to be part of the film, but also gives me a wonderful opportunity to present one of the most-successful animated films to our local audiences,' she added.

She added that her 'happiness just goes up a notch' now that her cousin Parineeti has joined her to voice Anna.

Connect: 'Elsa is a fictional character who''s known to be strongly-opinionated and level headed, traits that I deeply connect with,' Chopra said

'The two of us have never worked together before and this seems like a perfect movie to come together and an experience that I am going to cherish forever,' she added.

Parineeti added that she didn't need to be an actress to, 'dream of being a Disney princess!'

'I absolutely loved the first film, it''s my favorite animation film but never thought that I'd get to voice Anna,' she added.

Together: 'The two of us have never worked together before and this seems like a perfect movie to come together and an experience that I am going to cherish forever,' she added

Aside from Anna and Elsa, Frozen 2 also brings back Josh Gad's Olaf and Jonathan Groff's Kristoff, though it hasn't been revealed who will voice those characters for the Indian version yet.

The animated sequel also features new characters Iduna, voiced by Evan Rachel Wood, Ryder, voiced by Jason Ritter and Lieutenant Matthias, voiced by Sterling K. Brown.

The original Frozen, released in November 2013, became the highest grossing animated movie of all time, earning $400.7 million domestic and $1.276 billion worldwide.

Sequel: Aside from Anna and Elsa, Frozen 2 also brings back Josh Gad's Olaf and Jonathan Groff's Kristoff, though it hasn't been revealed who will voice those characters for the Indian version yet
description: While Kristen Bell and Idina Menzel will return to voice Anna and Elsa in Frozen 2, in theaters November 27, the Indian-language version has landed two of Bollywood's biggest stars.
